channel.title: Astronomer of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomer of the day.

item.title: Hakeem Oluseyi
item.description: Hakeem Muata Oluseyi (born James Edward Plummer Jr.; March 13, 1967) is an American astrophysicist, cosmologist, inventor, educator, science communicator, author, actor, veteran, and humanitarian.
